Description: As technologies in our industry advance in complexity, speed, sensitivity and ease of use, the opportunity to use multiple approaches to answer high-dimensional biological questions is changing and expanding our knowledge of immunology. This presentation will highlight how the combined use of high-parameter analytical flow cytometry and advanced single-cell multiomic tools (proteomic and genomic) can help define functional murine NK cell subsets.
SearchResultBody: ESP25. BD Biosciences: Deep Science Seminar: High-dimensional biology for biomarker discovery and functional characterization of novel cell subsets
Title: BD Biosciences: Deep Science Seminar: High-dimensional biology for biomarker discovery and functional characterization of novel cell subsets
